DOC.brief_summary: The study hypothesis is that caregivers experience allows them to develop a lot of knowledge and know-how about behavioural problems in Huntington Disease and its consequences. The purpose of this study is to collect, describe and analyse caregivers experience in order to find and enhance their knowledge related to the adaptation to behavioural problems of Huntington Disease patients.
DOC.brief_title: Behavioural Problems in Huntington Disease : Analysis and Enhancement of Caregiver and Patient Experience
